0011000000010011 0111011110111111 1 -> sum: 1010011111010011, cout: 0
0100100110011111 1000010111101000 0 -> sum: 1100111110000111, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
